languages.text: "Мое служение не может быть закончено, пока в Просторе остается хоть один все еще дышащий еретик".

traits.locale_text: "Мое служение не может быть закончено, пока в Просторе остается хоть один все еще дышащий еретик".

languages.text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."
languages.original_text: "Мое служение не может быть закончено, пока в Просторе остается хоть один все еще дышащий еретик".

traits.locale_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic left who is still breathing."
"My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic left who is still breathing."
"My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."
"My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."
"My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."
"My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

languages.text: 「このエクスパンスに異端者が一人でも生きている限り、私の任務は終わらないんだ」
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: 「このエクスパンスに異端者が一人でも生きている限り、私の任務は終わらないんだ」

languages.text: "Meine Pflicht in der Ausdehnung ist noch nicht getan, solange nur ein einziger Ketzer noch atmet."
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Pflicht in der Ausdehnung ist noch nicht getan, solange nur ein einziger Ketzer noch atmet."

languages.text: « Ma mission dans les étendues ne sera accomplie que lorsqu'il ne restera plus un seul hérétique en vie. »
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: « Ma mission dans les étendues ne sera accomplie que lorsqu'il ne restera plus un seul hérétique en vie. »

languages.text: «Mi deber en la Extensión no se habrá cumplido mientras quede un solo hereje con vida».
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: «Mi deber en la Extensión no se habrá cumplido mientras quede un solo hereje con vida».

languages.text: “只要还有一个异端分子活着，我在科罗努斯扩区的职责就没有完成。”
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: “只要还有一个异端分子活着，我在科罗努斯扩区的职责就没有完成。”

languages.text: "Enginlik'teki vazifem, tüm kâfirlerin kökü kuruyana dek sürecek."
languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik'teki vazifem, tüm kâfirlerin kökü kuruyana dek sürecek."

languages.original_text: "My duty in the Expanse is not done as long as there is even a single heretic still breathing."
